original_text: Some people think that they always obey God. I have not come to help people like that. Some people know that they have done wrong things. I am asking those people to come to me for help. I want them to change how they live.’
korean_text: 내가 의인을 부르러 온 것이 아니요 죄인을 불러 회개시키러 왔노라

sentences.original_text: I have not come to help people like that
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그런 사람들을 돕기 위해 온 것이 아니다

sentences.original_text: that they have done wrong things
to come to me for help
I want them to change how they live
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 생활 방식을 바꾸기를 원한다
